form.question: Choose your next steps
form.text1: An event refers to a stage within a procurement project, such as a request for information, further competition, or direct award. A project can consist of multiple events.
form.text2: If you select ‘Close this event and start a new event’, you will be presented with a list of routes to market. The new event will inherit the agreement and project ID of your current event.
form.text3: Suppliers will be notified by email confirming that the event has closed.

items.value: Close this event and the whole project
items.text: Close this event and the whole project

hint.text: You will still be able to view this event but you will not be able to reopen it.
